title: Idea to new Champion
body:
I think the idea that I am creating for a new champion for the game bequeath a champion of legends is based more on proximity distance as this adc. But has many adc difference there is in the game? this is not AD This is AP but this is lacking in mobility but with pensa much magic damage, this champion could be like the king of the damaged or other mystical being who his weapon be a sacred weapon created by the gods Olympians poderoza a spear so that you have it has a mystical granpoder to touch the countrysideIn can stay in the air and attack with his spear with your fingers.

let's put aside that and go through their skills.

Passive: Each magic damage makes it stronger to physical damage
Q: This throws his spear and inpacta against the enemy and it returns when he returns in this action can hit the enemy launches Cruze that when you return this.
W: Eta aumeta the magical and physical damage of the spear.
 E: A stun
A: This throws his spear as an arrow ashe not causing a stun if no actual harm.

This is resistant to physical damage and weak against magic damage. It has much magic damage. so it will not broken at least 67 magic damage.  {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Parece que Open Inglich si te sirvio
NIce try, but you need to practice... like, a lot.
Sabés que no estás en los foros de Norte América, verdad?
